title: Drawing, "Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Steinway and Sons, Baby Grand Piano", April 24, 1933
medium: Graphite, red, orange, and blue color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Designer's stamp in purple ink at lower left: see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/DESIGN NO 7203 [underlined]; below designer's stamp: STEINWAY DESIGN/NO 1021 [underlined]; Inscribed in graphite with materials, dimensions and notes throughout; Inscribed in graphite in designer's stamp: X-78 / April 24th / HK. / 1933 /REVISED BY Olsson / 4/26/33; Inscribed in graphite on verso: X-78
description: Side elevations of Steinway and Sons Baby Grand Piano for the Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933. Materials, dimensions and instructions for construction throughout drawing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Century of Progress Chicago International Exposition of 1933: Steinway and Sons, Baby Grand Piano", April 24, 1933.
April 24, 1933. Graphite, red, orange, and blue color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-287.
